purpleculture_examples:
壓力 [ yā lì ]: pressure
壓迫 [ yā pò ]: to oppress; to repress; to constrict; oppression; stress (physics)
壓縮 [ yā suō ]: to compress; compression
壓抑 [ yā yì ]: to constrain or repress emotions; oppressive; stifling; depressing; repression
壓板 [ yà bǎn ]: vise jaw; press board (machine); see-saw
壓根 [ yà gēn ]: from the start; absolutely; entirely; simply
壓根兒 [ yà gēn r ]: erhua variant of 压根
壓馬路 [ yà mǎ lù ]: variant of 轧马路
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿱ Above to below
    • 厭 [ yàn ] to dislike, to detest; to reject; to satiate
    • 土 [ tǔ ] soil, earth; items made of earth
heisig_chinese_memo: Many people detest everything about their boss, including the soil they walk on, for putting so much pressure on them.
Ru_trainchinese:
yā: (глаг/сущ) нажимать, давить; накрывать; подчинять; сдерживать; одерживать победу над; приближаться; откладывать в сторону; делать ставку; давление
yà: (графема) используется в ограниченном количестве слов, см. 压根儿
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: The ground is under great pressure from the towering cliff above it.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the " earth ", the sound of " weary " means that gravity is applied from top to bottom. "Mandarin ‧ Lu Yu": "Fu Dong collapsed and collapsed, I am afraid of oppression."

" Pressure " can mean collapse or blockage. "Shuowen": "Bad. One said: Fill up. From the soil, I hate the sound." "New Book of Tang Dynasty-Pei Yanling Biography": "I live in the bathing hall. Also." "The Book of the Later Han Dynasty·Xunli Biography·Wang Huan": "He has been accused of long-term litigation, political affairs are constant, and legal principles are difficult to be settled, and he will cheat and suppress all doubts."

" Press " also means subduing and persecution. "The Fourteenth Anniversary of Gongyang Biography-Wengong": "If the son is overwhelmed by the great power, it is unknown whether Qi or Jin has it."

" Press " also means approaching. "Twenty-sixth Year of Zuo Zhuan-Xiang Gong": "In the battle of Yanling, Chu Chen pressed the Jin army and Chen, and the Jin general fleeed."

" Press " also means surpassing and surpassing. Tang Liu Zongyuan's "Book with Xiao Hanlin": "You can't go beyond the same column, and the sound cannot be overwhelmed in the world."

" Press " also refers to restraint. "Songs of the Chu-Nine Debates": "However, I am confused by the middle road, and learn to recite from the pressure."

" Pressure " also refers to covering and covering. Tang Lihe "Yanmen Prefect Xing": "The black cloud is pressing against the city and the city is about to be destroyed, and the light of the armor opens towards the golden scales of the sun.
humanum_short_description_en: From the " earth ", the sound of " weary " means that gravity is applied from top to bottom.
humanum_full_description:
從「土」，「厭」聲，表示從上向下加以重力。《國語‧魯語下》：「夫棟折而榱崩，吾懼壓焉。」

　　「壓」可表示崩壞，也表示堵塞。《說文》：「壞也。一曰：塞補。从土，厭聲。」 《新唐書‧裴延齡傳》：「朕所居浴堂殿，一棟將壓，念易之，未能也。」《後漢書‧循吏傳‧王渙》：「其冤嫌久訟，政所不斷，法理所難平者，莫不曲盡情詐，壓塞羣疑。」」

　　「壓」也表示制服、逼迫。《公羊傳‧文公十四年》：「子以大國壓之，則未知齊、晉孰有之也。」

　　「壓」還表示逼近。《左傳‧襄公二十六年》：「鄢陵之役，楚晨壓晉軍而陳，晉將遁矣。」

　　「壓」亦表示超越、勝過。唐柳宗元〈與蕭翰林俛書〉：「才不能踰同列，聲不能壓當世。」

　　「壓」也指克制。《楚辭‧九辯》：「然中路而迷惑兮，自壓桉而學誦。」

　　「壓」還指覆蓋、籠罩。唐李賀〈雁門太守行〉：「黑雲壓城城欲摧，甲光向日金鱗開。」
humanum_short_description: 從「土」，「厭」聲，表示從上向下加以重力。

①從上面加力：壓住。壓碎。壓縮。泰山壓頂。
②用威力制服、鎮服：鎮壓。壓服。壓迫。
③控制，使穩定，使平靜：壓價。壓住陣腳。
④擱置：積壓。
⑤逼近：大兵壓境。
⑥賭博時在某一門上下注：壓寶(亦作“押寶”)。

Chinese: Many people detest everything about their boss, including the soil they walk on, for putting so much pressure on them.
Meaning: pressure
Hanzi: 压
Story: The ground is under great pressure from the towering cliff above it.
Kind: traditional

從「 土 」，「 厭 」聲，表示從上向下加以重力。《國語‧魯語下》：「夫棟折而榱崩，吾懼壓焉。」 「 壓 」可表示崩壞，也表示堵塞。《說文》：「壞也。一曰：塞補。从土，厭聲。」 《新唐書‧裴延齡傳》：「朕所居浴堂殿，一棟將壓，念易之，未能也。」《後漢書‧循吏傳‧王渙》：「其冤嫌久訟，政所不斷，法理所難平者，莫不曲盡情詐，壓塞羣疑。」」 「 壓 」也表示制服、逼迫。《公羊傳‧文公十四年》：「子以大國壓之，則未知齊、晉孰有之也。」 「 壓 」還表示逼近。《左傳‧襄公二十六年》：「鄢陵之役，楚晨壓晉軍而陳，晉將遁矣。」 「 壓 」亦表示超越、勝過。唐柳宗元〈與蕭翰林俛書〉：「才不能踰同列，聲不能壓當世。」 「 壓 」也指克制。《楚辭‧九辯》：「然中路而迷惑兮，自壓桉而學誦。」 「 壓 」還指覆蓋、籠罩。唐李賀〈雁門太守行〉：「黑雲壓城城欲摧，甲光向日金鱗開。」
From the " earth", the sound of " weary" means that gravity is applied from top to bottom. "Mandarin ‧ Lu Yu": "Fu Dong collapsed and collapsed, I am afraid of oppression." " Pressure" can mean collapse or blockage. "Shuowen": "Bad. One said: Fill up. From the soil, I hate the sound." "New Book of Tang Dynasty-Pei Yanling Biography": "I live in the bathing hall. Also." "The Book of the Later Han Dynasty·Xunli Biography·Wang Huan": "He has been accused of long-term litigation, political affairs are constant, and legal principles are difficult to be settled, and he will cheat and suppress all doubts." " Press" also means subduing and persecution. "The Fourteenth Anniversary of Gongyang Biography-Wengong": "If the son is overwhelmed by the great power, it is unknown whether Qi or Jin has it." " Press" also means approaching. "Twenty-sixth Year of Zuo Zhuan-Xiang Gong": "In the battle of Yanling, Chu Chen pressed the Jin army and Chen, and the Jin general fleeed." " Press" also means surpassing and surpassing. Tang Liu Zongyuan's "Book with Xiao Hanlin": "You can't go beyond the same column, and the sound cannot be overwhelmed in the world." " Press" also refers to restraint. "Songs of the Chu-Nine Debates": "However, I am confused by the middle road, and learn to recite from the pressure." " Pressure" also refers to covering and covering. Tang Lihe "Yanmen Prefect Xing": "The black cloud is pressing against the city and the city is about to be destroyed, and the light of the armor opens towards the golden scales of the sun.

壓字的基本解释

壓
yā

壓
yà
均见“压”。

壓字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yā］
［《廣韻》烏甲切，入狎，影。］
“压1”的繁体字。
(1)从上向下加以重力。
(2)崩坏。
(3)以权势或强力抑制；逼迫。
(4)杀。参见“壓羊”。
(5)逼近。
(6)超越；居于其他事物之上。
(7)克制；按捺。
(8)覆盖；笼罩。
(9)搁；藏。
(10)同“押”。
(11)镇住，以优势或力量使人服从。
(12)盖印。
(13)塞补；存储。参见“壓裝”。
(14)酿酒的一种方法。
(15)书法术语。用笔以食指上节端压定笔管之右曰压。
(16)赌博者在某一门上下注。参见“壓寶”。
壓2［yà］
“压2”的繁体字。
见“壓2根兒”。

壓字的康熙字典解释

【丑集中】【土字部】　壓； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页241第10
【廣韻】烏甲切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】乙甲切，?音鴨。【說文】壞也，笮也，塞補也。一曰鎭壓。【唐書·柳仲郢傳】仲郢爲京兆尹，政號嚴明。爲河南尹，以寬惠爲政，或言不類京師時。仲郢曰：輦轂之下，彈壓爲先。郡邑之治，惠愛爲本。　又【集韻】益涉切，音嬮。伏也，合也。　又諾協切，音㘨。一指按也。　又於豔切。通作厭。足也，疾惡也。【前漢·叔孫通傳】朕甚壓苦之。　或作厭饜。

壓字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
壓字的起名意思

暂无。

Pressure
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yā］
["Guangyun" Wujia cut, enter the 狎, shadow. ]
"Press 1" in traditional characters.
(1) Apply gravity from top to bottom.
(2) Collapse.
(3) To restrain with power or force; to persecute.
(4) Kill. See "Pressing Sheep".
(5) Approaching.
(6) Transcendence; superior to other things.
(7) Restraint; restraint.
(8) Cover; shroud.
(9) Shelving; Tibetan.
(10) Same as "detention".
(11) Stay calm, use superiority or strength to make people obey.
(12) Stamping.
(13) Plugging; storage. See "Press Fit".
(14) A method of making wine.
(15) Calligraphy terms. Use the pen to press the upper end of the index finger to the right side of the pen tube.
(16) The gambler places a bet on a certain gate. See "Pressing Treasure".
Press 2 [yà]
"Press 2" in traditional characters.
See "Press 2 roots".
Pressure

[Book of Tang·Liu Zhongying Biography] Zhongying is Jing Zhaoyin, with a strict political title. When he was Henan Yin, he was governed by Kuanhui, or his words were not like Jingshi. Zhong Ying said: Under the hub, spring pressure is the first. The rule of the county is based on love and love.　[Jiyun] Yisheqie, Yinzhuo. Fu Ye, He Ye.　Nuo Xieqie, sound 㘨. One finger press too.　Yanqie again. All get bored. The feet are also sick. [Former Han·Shu Sun Tong Chuan] I am very sad.　Or disgusting.
